duties_responsibilities.duty: Act as the subject matter expert and provide guidance to support desk team members through training and mentoring.
Oversee the daily operations of the service desk, including performance management, career coaching, and development of policies for consistency.
Maintain strong business relations and lead support efforts enterprise-wide when required.
Work with third parties to manage supplier relationships and ensure service levels are met.
Troubleshoot and resolve end-users' complex problems.

education_certification.credential: Associate’s degree in Information Systems, Computer Science or equivalent
